articles.description: England host Sri Lanka in the second Test at Lord's – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.

articles.description: All the latest transfer news on deadline day as Premier League clubs look to finish their summer business with the window closing at 23:00 BST.
articles.title: Transfer Deadline Day live: Updates on Toney, Sancho & others as window set to close

articles.description: Third seed Carlos Alcaraz suffers a seismic second-round exit at the US Open with a thumping defeat by unseeded Dutchman Botic van de Zandschulp.
articles.title: US Open 2024 results: Carlos Alcaraz stunned by Botic van de Zandschulp in US Open upset

articles.description: Kadeena Cox describes the 2024 Paralympics as "a nightmare I can't wake up from" after her crash in the final of her C4-5 500m time trial.
articles.title: Kadeena Cox: 2024 Paralympics 'a nightmare I can't wake up from'

articles.description: Two-time champion Naomi Osaka says it feels like "my heart dies every time I lose" after her second-round defeat by Karolina Muchova at the US Open.
articles.title: US Open 2024 results: Naomi Osaka feels her 'heart dies' every time she loses after Karolina Muchova defeat

articles.description: Top seed Iga Swiatek breezes into the third round of the US Open, while former Wimbledon champion Elena Rybakina withdraws.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Iga Swiatek sails into third round; Elena Rybakina withdraws

articles.description: Novak Djokovic continues his bid for a record 25th Grand Slam singles title against Alexei Popyrin in the third round at the US Open, with Coco Gauff and Aryna Sabalenka also in action.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Novak Djokovic, Coco Gauff and Aryna Sabalenka in action on day five
